feed.title: timetorain
feed.subtitle: 这是一个消息平台。|This is a message platfrom.

entry.title: Minecraft 11周年 2020.5.17|The 11th years of Minecraft
entry.content:
Minecraft在不知不觉中已陪伴我们走过十一年，今天是5月13日，离第一个有关Minecraft的视频发布已过去了十一年，或许5月17日才是Minecraft真正发布的日子，但是我仍然在此提前恭贺Minecraft:"十一周年快乐!"
——致那些逝去的曾经
Minecraft has been with us for eleven years without knowing it. Today is May 13th. It has been 11 years since the first video about Minecraft was released. Perhaps May 17th is the day when Minecraft was really released , But I am still here to congratulate Minecraft in advance: "Happy 11th Anniversary!"
——To those who have passed away

entry.title: 漏洞报告|Bugs report|ID:Website Bugs 1
entry.content:
翻译总是会出现错误。
There will always be errors in translation.
ID：Website Bugs 1
状态：未解决|Status: Unresolved

entry.title: 漏洞报告|Bugs report|ID:Server Bugs 1
entry.content:
当服务器重启过后，进入服务器时出生点总是不正确。
When the server is restarted, the birth point is always incorrect when entering the server.
ID：Server Bugs 1
状态：未解决|Status: Unresolved

entry.title: 服务器介绍|Server's introduction
entry.content:
这是我本人自建的Minecraft服务器，服务器地址为：timetorain.minehut.gg，服务器暂时只能容纳十人同时进行游戏，管理暂时只有timetorain，以后或许会扩大规模。若你想切换分区，请说/worlds。

服务器分区

大厅_有规则——来到大厅后，所有人都会到达中转站，按下按钮后，你的出生点将会设置于大厅，普通玩家的游戏模式总是冒险模式，进入后，普通玩家总是会会拥有虚弱以及饱和效果。TNT以及TNT矿车被禁止。雕像上加入了屏障。你不能飞行太高。(256格)

生存区_有规则——出生点方圆一百格内普通玩家都会是冒险模式，出了一百格后会更新为生存模式。出生点方圆三十五格之内的苦力怕以及掉落物会被清除，出生点方圆一百格之内普通玩家会拥有虚弱效果，出生点方圆七十五格内会有饱和效果。TNT以及TNT矿车被禁止。雕像上加入了屏障。你不能飞行太高。(256格)

下界_有规则——你不能飞行太高。(256格)

终界_有规则——你不能飞行太高。(256格)

This is my own Minecraft server, the server address is: timetorain.minehut.gg, the server can only temporarily accommodate ten people to play games at the same time, the management is only timetorain, and may expand in the future. If you want to switch partitions, please say / worlds.

Server partition

Lobby _ Has rules——After arriving in the lobby, everyone will arrive at the transfer station. After pressing the button, your birth point will be set in the lobby. The game mode of ordinary players is always adventure mode. Will have weakness and saturation effects. TNT and TNT minecarts are prohibited. A barrier was added to the statue. You can't fly too high. (256 squares)

Survival zone _ Has rules——Ordinary playershundred squares of the birth point will be in adventure mode, and will update to survival mode after one hundred squares. The drudgery and falling objects within 35 squares of the birth point will be cleared. Ordinary players within 100 squares of the birth point will have a weak effect, and within 75 squares of the birth point will have saturation effects. TNT and TNT minecarts are prohibited. A barrier was added to the statue. You can't fly too high. (256 squares)

The_nature_Has rules——you can't fly too high. (256 squares)

The_end_Has rules——you can't fly too high. (256 squares)
